version_description:
New features and Improvements:

•Clip and Limiter indication is now functional
•Firmware update process optimization
•Support for factory preset recall (works only with firmware v5.0.9 and above)
•Bug fixes

1. Performance optimizations
- Connect to multiple speakers in parallel
- Quicker connection time
2. Additional parameter controls for Ducking
3. Wait indicator for completion of Association among the speakers in BT-Broadcast mode
4. Speaker blinks for 10 seconds on starting firmware update
5. Bug fixes
Fix for firmware update failure issue.

• Fix for EQ boost issue when band width is set to maximum.
• Improvements in Audio playback while in BT Broadcast mode
• Bug fixes

Note: All fixes work only with speakers having firmware version 5.1.4.
